#summary Golf Markup Language Reference: Gps.

= Description =

The Gps element records the position of a point on the surface of Earth.

= Attributes =

The element has the following attributes:

 # Reference - Optional. Referencial System. Currently only WGS84 is supported but other reference system are conceivable.

= Elements = 

== Descriptive Elements ==

The element has the following descriptive elements:

 # lat - Latitude of the point in decimal system.
 # lon - Longitude of the point in decimal system.
 # alt - Latitude of the point in meters.
 # Precision - Precision of the record in meters.


== Structural Elements ==

None.


= Notes =



= See Also =

Parent element: [Position].
